p: The mean monthly dengue incidence averaged 6.94 cases (standard deviation 14.49) per 100,000 people over the period (2001â€“2010). Over the wet period (May-November with a mean monthly rainfall >40mm), the mean dengue incidence was 10.31 cases per 100,000 (SD 18.51). Provinces in the southern parts of the country had higher reported incidences compared to those from central and northern regions. Hanoi city also reported appreciably higher number of cases compared to the neighboring areas ( Fig 2).
